LongDescription:
TRACK REPLACEMENT | 3:30 AM, Sat Jun 16 to 10 PM Sun, Jun 17
No [1] trains between 137 St, Manhattan and 242 St, the Bronx

[A] trains, M3, M100 and [SB] free shuttle buses provide alternate service

[1] Service operates in Manhattan between South Ferry and 137 St.

[SB] Buses operate along four routes making station stops on the [1] line:
1. Broadway between 242 and 215 St, stopping at the 207 St [A] station.
2. Dyckman St between [1] and [A] stations late nights only. Use M100 days/evenings.
3. St Nicholas Av between 191 and 168 Sts. Free transfer for M3 service.
4. Broadway between 168 and 137 Sts.

Use the [A] train for service to/from nearby stations in Washington Heights.

• Transfer between [1] and [A] trains at 59 St-Columbus Circle.
• Transfer between [1] trains and [SB] shuttle buses at the 137 St [1] Station.
• Transfer between [A] trains and [SB] shuttle buses at the 168 St and 207 St [A] stations.
